body: Everyone has limits; for example I'm fine with this but I can't handle guro at all. I didn't start off liking this stuff either but over time got used to it. Chances are your own limits will erode to some degree as well.
I think I'll respect other people who like this, but I must say I'm glad that even my own perverseness has a limit lol
Please respect others opinions. People like me who enjoy scat are not forcing you to watch or enjoy this content if you dislike it please just don't read it.
